sentences.en: A double - subscript scheme will be used to identify the stresses.
sentences.cn: 为了区别各种应力还将采用双下标格式.

sentences.en: An array subscript is not valid because it falls outside the allowable range.
sentences.cn: 数组下标无效,因为它不在允许的范围内.

sentences.en: Discuss the pros and cons of implementing this operation using the subscript operator.
sentences.cn: 讨论用下标操作符实现这个操作的优缺点.

sentences.en: Each subscript can vary from zero through its bound value.
sentences.cn: 每个上标都可能在零到其上限值之间变动.

sentences.en: In a single - species fluid, the subscript may be dropped.
sentences.cn: 对于 单组分 流体, 这个下标可以省略.

sentences.en: Next, the subscript expression is evaluated.
sentences.cn: 接着, 下标表达式被求值.

sentences.en: Octal numbers are identified by a trailing 8 subscript.
sentences.cn: 八进制数由一个附加的下标8来识别。

sentences.en: Subscript: Small character printed below the base part of mathematic equation Inferior character.
sentences.cn: 下标字符: 在数学公式内,放在基线下的细字.

sentences.en: The array subscript is a non integer expression.
sentences.cn: 该数组下标是非整型表达式.

sentences.en: The atomic number appears as a subscript.
sentences.cn: 把原子系数标在左下角.

sentences.en: The mean score - obtaining rates of K and W ( subscript k ) were 62 % and 70 % , respectively.
sentences.cn: 其爱滋病知识主要来 、 源为一般或医学报章杂志.

sentences.en: The subscript O and W identify the unweathered and weathered states.
sentences.cn: 下标O和W分别表示属于未风化和已风化的状态.

sentences.en: The subscript operator must be defined as a class member function.
sentences.cn: 下标操作符必须定义为类成员函数.

sentences.en: The subscript was used on a variable that was not an array.
sentences.cn: 该下标用在了不是数组的变量上.

sentences.en: To create superscript or a subscript do the following.
sentences.cn: 按下列步骤创建上标或下标.

sentences.en: You can use subscript and superscript, too.
sentences.cn: 你也能使用下标文字和上标文字.

trans.tran_cn: 下标的，写在下方的，脚注的
trans.tran_en: (of a character) written or printed below the line
